snippet.title: Overcooked - Gourmet Edition Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Chefs, the time has come to return to the kitchen!

A time portal anomaly has sent your team back to a time before cities and space stations and it looks like you've got to cook your way out. Complete 6 challenging new levels and recruit a whole host of new friends along the way including a Panda, a Robot and even a Dinosaur!

The boxed Overcooked Gourmet Edition is available now at selected retailers for Xbox One and PlayStation 4 priced at £19.99/24,99 €. A US boxed version will be available at retail from the 15th November for $19.99.

The Lost Morsel DLC will launch digitally for Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC on the 15th November for just £3.99/$4.99/4,49€, while the Gourmet Edition digital bundle (which includes both Overcooked and The Lost Morsel DLC) will also be available for £15.99/$19.99/19,99€.


Team17, founded in 1990, are a fully independent Video Game Developer and Games Label, responsible for the Worms™ series, Beyond Eyes, Sheltered and  many more. Ensure you never miss out on our latest videos by subscribing to us now: bit.ly/SubTeam17

Don't forget you can also
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Follow us on Twitter: http://bit.ly/FollowT17
Follow Overcooked on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Overcookedgame
